advisory.name: RLBA-2022:2063
advisory.synopsis: firewalld bug fix and enhancement update
advisory.topic: An update for firewalld is now available for Rocky Linux 8.
advisory.description: For detailed information on changes in this release, see the Rocky Linux 8.6 Release Notes linked from the References section.

fixes.description: firewalld with nftables while processing rich rules fails to parse ipv4 address if specified with netmask
LogDenied=unicast is configured in firewalld.conf, but icmp echo-request accepted log is shown in /var/log/messages
Saving same ip in multiple zones by editing the file, followed by "firewall-cmd --reload" breaks the system connectivity.
